Constructor Detail

StateMachine

public StateMachine(StateFlowGraph sfg,
                    StateVertix indexState)
Create a new StateMachine with a empty Invariant list in the InvariantChecker.

Parameters:
sfg - the state flow graph that is shared.
indexState - the state representing the Index vertix

StateMachine

public StateMachine(StateFlowGraph sfg,
                    StateVertix indexState,
                    List<Invariant> invariantList)
Create a new StateMachine.

Parameters:
sfg - the state flow graph that is shared.
indexState - the state representing the Index vertix
invariantList - the invariants to use in the InvariantChecker.
Method Detail

changeState

public boolean changeState(StateVertix nextState)
Change the currentState to the nextState if possible. The next state should already be present in the graph.

Parameters:
nextState - the next state.
Returns:
true if currentState is successfully changed.

addStateToCurrentState

private StateVertix addStateToCurrentState(StateVertix newState,
                                           Eventable eventable)
Adds the newState and the edge between the currentState and the newState on the SFG.

Parameters:
newState - the new state.
eventable - the clickable causing the new state.
Returns:
the clone state iff newState is a clone, else returns null

getCurrentState

public StateVertix getCurrentState()
Return the current State in this state machine.

Returns:
the current State.

rewind

public void rewind()
reset the state machine to the initial state.

update

public boolean update(Eventable event,
                      StateVertix newState,
                      EmbeddedBrowser browser,
                      CrawlSession session)
Parameters:
event - the event edge.
newState - the new state.
browser - used to feet to checkInvariants
session - the current Session
Returns:
true if the new state is not found in the state machine.

checkInvariants

private void checkInvariants(EmbeddedBrowser browser,
                             CrawlSession session)
Check the invariants. This call is nearly thread safe only calls to set/get affected nodes in a Invariant may produce wrong output.

Parameters:
browser - the browser to feed to the invariants
session - the current CrawlSession
